item.title: Introducing the R {newsanchor} package
item.description: At CorrelAid, we developed a tool for communication scientists, journalists and data scientists alike: {newsanchor}, CorrelAidâ€™s first open source R package. It conveniently helps you to access breaking news and articles from over 30,000 news sources and blogs - using the API of newsapi.org. I have co-authored the package and I am thrilled to introduce the package here, too. The (mostly free) News API is one way to access text as a resource for data analyses.
